greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle, antidiagonals of an array generated from A130460.
formula: Let A130460 = M, an infinite lower triangular matrix and V = [1, 1, 1,...], the first row of an array. Perform M * V = second row,...; (n+1)-th row = M * n-th row. The triangle = antidiagonals of the array.
example: First few rows of the triangle are:
